title: Build GenAI Applications Locally With Docker Model Runner
author: Janakiram MSV
description: Want to run a large language model (LLM) locally? Here's how to set up Docker Model Runner and get access to LLMs on your own desktop.
cntitle: 使用 Docker Model Runner 在本地构建 GenAI 应用程序
cndescription: 想在本地运行大型语言模型（LLM）吗？ 这里介绍如何设置 Docker Model Runner，并在您自己的桌面上访问 LLM。
